aboutUs.hero.title: About EzyMart
aboutUs.hero.subtitle: At EzyMart, our mission is simple: to make everyday shopping easier for everyone. We help you find what you need, right when you need it, by connecting you with trusted local stores across Sri Lanka. It's shopping, made smarter.
aboutUs.features.title: What Makes Us Different
aboutUs.features.subtitle: We're not just another shopping app. We're your local shopping companion.
aboutUs.features.innovative.title: Innovative Team
aboutUs.features.innovative.description: We focus on nearby stores, not big marketplaces helping you shop local and support your community.
aboutUs.features.solution.title: Innovative Solution
aboutUs.features.solution.description: Designed for real needs, EzyMart makes finding products and stores quick, clear, and stress free.
aboutUs.features.support.title: 24/7 Support
aboutUs.features.support.description: Our dedicated team is always here to help you with any questions or issues you might have.
aboutUs.visionMission.vision.title: Our Vision
aboutUs.visionMission.vision.description: To be the leading platform that transforms how people discover and connect with local businesses, creating stronger communities through technology.
aboutUs.visionMission.mission.title: Our Mission
aboutUs.visionMission.mission.descriptio: Making everyday shopping easier for everyone by connecting customers with trusted local stores through innovative technology.
aboutUs.visionMission.values.title: Our Values
aboutUs.visionMission.values.community.d: We believe in supporting local businesses and building stronger communities.
We constantly innovate to provide better solutions for our users.
aboutUs.visionMission.values.trust.title: Trust & Reliability
aboutUs.visionMission.values.trust.descr: We build trust through transparency and reliable service.
We strive for excellence in everything we do.
aboutUs.story.title: Our Story
aboutUs.story.subtitle: How EzyMart came to life
aboutUs.story.content.0: EzyMart is a smart shopping platform developed by Vertex Cooperation (PVT) LTD, a team dedicated to creating practical, innovative tech solutions. Guided by our vision â€” Enhancing mankind's lifestyles for a better future â€” we aim to make everyday shopping easier, smarter, and more connected.
aboutUs.story.content.1: Our Project EzyMart is to bring small and mid-level businesses into the digital world and connect everyday customers with local shops through a smart, easy-to-use app. EzyMart helps users find nearby products quickly, making shopping more convenient, affordable, and efficientâ€”whether it's groceries, electronics, or daily essentials.
aboutUs.story.highlights.mission.title: Our Mission
aboutUs.story.highlights.mission.descrip: Making everyday shopping easier for everyone
aboutUs.story.highlights.focus.title: Local Focus
aboutUs.story.highlights.focus.descripti: Connecting customers with trusted local stores
aboutUs.story.highlights.technology.desc: Innovative solutions for better shopping experiences

aboutUs.visionMission.header.title: Our Vision & Mission
aboutUs.visionMission.header.subtitle: Driven by purpose, guided by innovation. Here's what motivates us to build a better future for local commerce.
aboutUs.visionMission.vision.content: Enhancing mankind's lifestyles for a better future through innovative technology and community-focused solutions.
aboutUs.visionMission.mission.content: Deliver high-quality and accessible convenience solutions that connect people with their local communities.
aboutUs.visionMission.coreValues.title: Our Core Values
aboutUs.visionMission.innovation.title: Innovation
aboutUs.visionMission.innovation.descrip: Continuously improving and creating solutions that make a real difference in people's lives.

aboutUs.visionMission.community.descript: Building strong relationships between businesses and customers to strengthen local economies.
